## Flyout.blockIsRecyclable\_() method

Returns whether the given block can be recycled or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected blockIsRecyclable_(_block: BlockSvg): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block to check for recyclability. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the block can be recycled. False otherwise.
